metadata.title: CVE-2022-3190 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
Infinite loop in the F5 Ethernet Trailer protocol dissector in Wireshark3.6.0 to 3.6.7 and 3.4.0 to 3.4.15 allows denial of service via packetinjection or crafted capture file

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-3190` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwireshark-data - 4.0.3-1
libwireshark17t64 - 4.0.3-1
libwiretap14t64 - 4.0.3-1
libwsutil15t64 - 4.0.3-1
tshark - 4.0.3-1
wireshark - 4.0.3-1
wireshark-common - 4.0.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wireshark package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.3-1').
